properties.displayName: Appends the deployment of MySQL to Enforce SSL connection is enabled for MySQL database servers
properties.description: Appends that Azure Database for MySQL supports connecting your Azure Database for MySQL server to client applications using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL). Append the setting for  SSL connections between your database server and your client applications helps protect against 'man in the middle' attacks by encrypting the data stream between the server and your application. This configuration enforces that SSL is always enabled for accessing your database server.
